home.title: Welcome to Selia
home.subtitle: A modern Laravel Inertia React starter kit
home.hero_description: The ultimate starter kit for Laravel 12 and React 19. Pre-configured with Inertia.js 2.0, Tailwind CSS 4.0, and a beautiful UI library to help you ship your next idea in record time.
home.features_description: Stop wasting time on configuration. Selia comes battery-packed with the latest technologies and best practices pre-configured.
home.feature_inertia_desc: Build single-page apps using classic server-side routing. No client-side routing complexity.
home.feature_react_desc: Leverage the latest React features including Server Components and Actions support.
home.feature_laravel_desc: The PHP framework for web artisans. Powerful, elegant, and ready for any scale.
home.feature_tailwind_desc: Rapidly build modern websites without ever leaving your HTML. Now faster than ever.
home.feature_ui_desc: A comprehensive set of accessible, unstyled components built on Radix UI and Shadcn.
home.feature_typesafe_desc: Full TypeScript support across the full stack with Spatie Laravel Data integration.
